## useStore

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/context/async-context.ts" sourceLine="140" packageName="commandkit" />

Use the shared data store in the current environment. Throws an error if no context is found.

```ts title="Signature"
function useStore(): Collection<any, any>
```
